Don't know why anyone will continue to use apple:

1. You use apple map? No
2. Apple photos? No
3. Apple contacts? No
4. Apple Imessage? No
5. Apple document backup? No
6. Apple calendar? No
7. Apple browser? No
8. Apple YouTube? Sorry no such thing
9. Apple iTunes for music? Are you joking?
10. Apple video player? No
11. Apple weather? No

For all these key functions, it's either Google or popular app, which requires only 1 single Google log in. Why would you pay 10,000 and log in 2 layers? The answer is clear and simple.

Get a inexpensive, good to use Android phone. I switched from iPhone since 4s, and have been using mi phone for 5 years. No problem at all. Smooth since Android upgrade 4 years ago.

It's the data. Not the phone any more.

IPhone is for idiots who want to prove they are.
